Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary decision: Is a specific worker assigned to a specific task?

Name: include_feature_in_sprint
Description: Binary decision: Is a specific feature/user story included in a specific sprint?

Name: start_date_for_task
Description: The planned start date for a specific task.

Name: end_date_for_task
Description: The planned end date for a specific task.

Name: assign_story_points
Description: The number of story points assigned to a specific user story.

Name: team_velocity
Description: The estimated velocity for a team in a given sprint.

Name: worker_availability
Description: The percentage of time a worker is available in a given period.

Name: task_effort_estimate
DataType: in person-hours) required for a task.

Name: blocker_resolution_time
Description: The number of days estimated to resolve a specific blocker.

Name: skill_proficiency_level
Description: The proficiency level of a worker for a specific skill.

Name: feature_priority
Description: The assigned business priority of a feature (can be adjusted within constraints).
